greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct parts less than or equal to n/2.
comment: Intuitively the sequence is asymptotic to A000009.  a(300)/A000009(300) is approximately .997749.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; local m; m:= i*(i+1)/2;
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, May 24 2015
